nameEntry.part: Records of the Uniting Church in Australia, Northern Synod

biogHist.abstract: The records of Uniting Church of Australia, Northern Synod are held by The Northern Territory Archives Service. These records relate to the missionary, welfare and other work of the Uniting Church and its predecessors, including the Methodist Overseas Mission, primarily in the Northern Territory.
biogHist.p: To access any Uniting Church, Northern Synod records which are less than 30 years old, you will need permission from the Uniting Church. Once the records are wholly within the open period, that is, completely over 30 years old, they are available for public access to researchers registered with the Northern Territory Archives Service (NTAS).

It is common, however, for records controlled by the Uniting Church to span the open and closed periods and so, if there is any doubt as to the date range of an item, permission must be sought prior to access.

To apply for permission you will need to write to the General Secretary at the Uniting Church in Australia Northern Synod Office stating why you would like to access the records and including a listing of the series and items that you would like to see. Archives staff can assist you with this. Item listings for each of the series listed below are available through the Northern Territory Archives Service. The address for the General Secretary is included on the NTAS Mission Records Information leaflet.
When permission has been granted, the Uniting Church will inform you and NTAS. You can then contact NTAS to arrange a time to visit the search room and view the records.
The records of the Uniting Church in Australia, Northern Synod relate to the following settlements, townships and institutions:

list.item: Minjilang
Warruwi
Maningrida
Milingimbi
Galiwinku (Elcho Island)
Gapuwiyak (Lake Evella)
Yirrkala
Nhulunbuy
the Kimberley (Western Australia)
Nungalinya College, Darwin, 1971-82
Child Care Somerville Homes, Darwin, 1964-79

biogHist.p: The following series make up the collection:

list.item: NTRS 2403 Slides of Croker Island mission ca1960-1962
NTRS 2404 Black and white photographs of Croker Island mission ca1960-1962
NTRS 37 Records relating to Minijilang Township 1952-1982
NTRS 38 Records relating to Warruwi Township 1940-1981
NTRS 39 Records relating to Maningrida Township 1971-1981
NTRS 40 Records relating to Milingimbi Township 1945-1983
NTRS 41 Records relating to Galiwinku (Elcho Island) Township 1969-1983
NTRS 42 Records relating to Gapuwiyak (Lake Evalla) Township 1973-1983
NTRS 43 Records relating to Yirrkala Township 1963-1980
NTRS 44 Records relating to Nhulunbuy Parish 1969-1980
NTRS 45 Records relating to Arnhem Land 1962-1975
NTRS 46 Records relating to the Arafura Presbytery 1947-1983
NTRS 47 Records relating to the Centre Presbytery, including Alice Springs and Tennant Creek n.d.
NTRS 48 Records relating to the Kimberley Presbytery n.d.
NTRS 49 Records relating to Nungalinya College, Darwin 1971-1982
NTRS 50 Records relating to child care, Somerville Homes, Darwin 1964-1979
NTRS 51 Records relating to Central Australian Institutions n.d.
NTRS 52 Records relating to the Aboriginal Advisory Development Services and Civic Economic Development Committee 1945-1983
NTRS 53 Records relating to the Methodist Overseas Mission 1961-1978
NTRS 54 Records relating to the Arnhem Land Progress Association 1974-1976
NTRS 55 Records relating to the Northern Synod and Joint Planning Committee 1966-1983
NTRS 56 Records relating to Aboriginal affairs 1959-1981
NTRS 57 Records relating to land rights and land councils 1976-1980
NTRS 58 Records relating to education and health 1970-1984
NTRS 59 Records relating to mining 1970-1983
NTRS 60 Records relating to religious organisations 1970-1982
NTRS 61 Records relating to government organisations 1963-1983
NTRS 62 Accounting and administrative records 1955-n.d.
NTRS 63 List of records received by the Northern Territory Archives Service from Uniting Church, Northern Synod 1984-1984
NTRS 781 General correspondence and administration records 1956-1986
